identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a non-profit portal that feels alive and engaging, not like a boring government form.

headings.usage: Use for all section titles, hero text, and card headers. Tight tracking.

body.usage: Use for all paragraph text, form labels, and navigation.

primary.name: Violet Wisdom
primary.usage: Primary buttons, key highlights, active states.

containers.card_style: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300
containers.glass_header: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-slate-200/50 sticky top-0 z-50

buttons.primary: bg-violet-600 text-white hover:bg-violet-700 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-bold shadow-lg shadow-violet-200 transition-transform hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-violet-600 border-2 border-violet-100 hover:border-violet-200 hover:bg-violet-50 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-bold transition-colors

inputs.style: h-12 rounded-xl border-slate-200 focus:border-violet-500 focus:ring-violet-500/20 bg-slate-50 focus:bg-white transition-all

cards.event_card: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-3xl bg-white border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-500

hero_main.usage: Home page hero section background or side image

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.4 }}

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure Violet-600 text is not used on dark backgrounds. Use White text on Violet-600 backgrounds.
accessibility.labels: All form inputs must have visible labels or aria-labels.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to 'index.css' at the very top.
3. THEME: Update 'tailwind.config.js' to include the custom colors (Violet, Amber, Teal) and fonts (Nunito, Outfit).
4. LAYOUT: Build the Home Page first. Use the 'hero_main' image. Make it vibrant.
5. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn for the 'Contact Form' and 'Registration Forms' but style them with the 'inputs.style' defined above.
6. ADMIN: Create a simple 'AdminLogin' and 'AdminDashboard' page. The dashboard should allow editing the 'Latest Event' text (mocked state).
7. EXCEL: Mock the Excel export functionality. Just console.log the data and show a success toast.
8. NAVIGATION: Create a responsive navbar with links: Home, Spell-Bee, Volunteer, Contact.
9. FOOTER: Include the Donation QR code in the footer.
10. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all buttons, inputs, and links.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects for the navbar.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
